metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24613 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: metadata-extractor up to 2.16.0 can throw various uncaught exceptions whileparsing a specially crafted JPEG file, which could result in an applicationcrash. This could be used to mount a denial of service attack againstservices that use metadata-extractor library.

criterions.comment: libmetadata-extractor-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
